appURI().details: Returns the metadata URI of the contract.

setAppURI(string).details: Sets contract URI for the storefront-level metadata of the contract.       Only module admin can call this function.

documentation.text: @dev Returns the metadata URI of the contract.

@dev Sets contract URI for the storefront-level metadata of the contract.
       Only module admin can call this function.
@dev Emitted when the contract URI is updated.

Thirdweb's `AppURI` is a contract extension for any base contracts. It lets you set a metadata URI
  for you contract.
